page.title: 20COMMENT AND CREDITS
page.content: We thoroughly enjoyed working on the Project and feel as if we're experts on our home area.Only disadvantage was that the grid was 1\ miles from our school but happily parents provided transport.Sadly one thing became clear,unemployment in the area and at the moment no plans for any expansion in any of the industries investigated. {CHILDREN TAKING PART;}J.Hunt,I. Lynn,I.Black,J.Sinclair,A.Black,D. Bowman,A.Fairlamb,L.Scoular,C.Owens,L. Campbell,D.Munro,J.Connor,L.Loach,J. Ramsay,D.Burgess,L.Brown,L.McGregor,M. Johnstone,S.Hands,B.Montgomery,S. McDade,K.Caldwell,S.Gilfillan,L. Malcolmson,M.Burt,K.Flannigan,J.Ivory, G.Smith,P.Chapman and E.Latona. {We hope that when the time comes for {us to leave school the future will {look much better. }
